content: 16 you ve just finished row 4 continue working times i e until you ve increased a total of 24 in the round 28 30 34 sts finishing with round 4 remove all markers on the last round sl1 knit until 1 st remains before the gap ssk this is the new bor and the start of the instep place a bor marker if desired work the established textured stitch pattern across the next 31 33 37 39 sts this is the end of instep place a marker if desired on needle 2 i e the sole k2tog and knit to the end of the round there are now 31 33 37 39 sts on needle 1 i e the instep and 29 33 35 39 sts on needle 2 i e the sole palace gate socks page 3/4 foot toe continue the established textured stitch work set-up rnds for sizes s and l as follows pattern on needle 1 and knit the sts on needle set-up round 1 on needle 1 k1 ssk knit until 3 2 until foot measures approximately 8 5 9 9 sts remain k2tog k1 knit the sts on needle 2 9 cm / 3⅜ 3½ 3½ 3⅝ inches less than the there are now 29 sts on each needle for size s desired final length finishing with round 1 of the and 35 sts on each needle for size l stitch pattern set-up round 2 knit next round knit the sts on needle 1 on needle 2 k14 k16 k17 k19 place a temporary bor there s no need to work set-up rnds for sizes marker this is a temporary bor for the next m and xl 15 rnds work the toe decreases for all sizes as follows switch to larger needles if desired and attach round 1 on needle 1 work *k1 ssk knit until 3 c1 work according to chart b row 1-15 sts remain k2tog k1* repeat * - * on needle chart b is repeated 10 11 12 13 times on 2 each round round 2 knit after finishing chart b cut c2 and remove the temporary bor marker continue working repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 21 21 25 27 sts with c1 only and knit to the original bor i e remain on each needle and you have just to the start of the instep finished round 2 then repeat only round 1 until 11 11 13 15 sts remain on each needle cut the switch to smaller needles if desired and work yarn and graft the toe in stockinette stitch until work measures approximately 3 5 4 4 4 cm / 1⅜ 1½ 1½ 1⅝ inches less than the desired final length abbreviations bor beginning of round chart b chart key c1 2 colour 1 2 k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together m1 2 3 4 stitch marker 1 2 3 4 m1l make 1 st left m1r make 1 st right p - purl p2tog
